title: Ticket #748: transfer_executable=false doesn't work with Condor-C
description:
Setting transfer_executable to false for a Condor-C job doesn't work properly. As part of the file transfer, the remote schedd is rewriting the Cmd attribute to point at a file in the spool directory. But the executable isn't transferred, so the rewritten value points to a non-existent file.

Here's a submit file that demonstrates the bug: 

universe = grid
grid_resource = condor nostos.cs.wisc.edu condor.cs.wisc.edu
executable = /bin/date
transfer_executable = false
should_transfer_files = YES
when_to_transfer_output = ON_EXIT
queue
remarks:

This same problem applies to transfer_input/output/error if the remote job is a grid universe job.
